data.text: Nà yɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI lɛbizu sìi ma voloi pɛ su,
À mina ɠaliva eteai zu zobobɛ nuiti ma,
Siɛgi zu ti yii loozu la, ta ɠalesu ma zooi wu,
Undaanɛ nu ɠa ga naa, nii ná-kpɔba nui ga Zakɔɓe ná-GALAGI,
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa é geeɠɔlɔgi ɓɛtɛa, ta zooi,
Toɠa ɗa sɔle fai ɠɛ naati bɛ, niiti ti ti nimizazu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa gaazuɠole nuiti gaazuʋɛ zeɠe ma.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa seikɔɠɔma nuiti makɛ.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa masadai ɠɛ eyɛsu ɠɔ,
